hi Ha,

it's true. it is okay to run Heritrix on Windows or Linux,
and we have experience running it on Windows, Linux, and Mac.

> And it could update the website in the second download?

i'm not sure what you mean by that. can you ask the
question in a different way? sorry. :)

i downloaded "An Introduction to Heritrix" from our FAQ

   http://crawler.archive.org/faq.html#introduction

and also encountered problems on:

   Mac OS X 10.5.5
   Preview 4.1, and
   Adobe Acrobat Reader 9.1.0

so i've uploaded a version to the files in this group:

   An Introduction to Heritrix
   Mohr-et-al-2004.pdf (263KB)
   http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/files/

i'll see if i can't fix the version in our FAQ.


/steve@...
